content: With everyone around the valley pathway defeated, be sure to look back toward that doorway we aren’t opening yet. The large ruined house has a wall with an entrance from the side the Rat Captain was on, and inside you should be able to find and absorb a green Wisp for some will and recharge your Gourd.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Village Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw'.
The content is as follows:
With everyone around the valley pathway defeated, be sure to look back toward that doorway we aren’t opening yet. The large ruined house has a wall with an entrance from the side the Rat Captain was on, and inside you should be able to find and absorb a green Wisp for some will and recharge your Gourd.
